meanings.sent1: Her ungenerosities towards others made her unpopular.
meanings.sent2: The ungenerosities of the wealthy can be disheartening.
meanings.sent3: Despite his ungenerosities, he still expected gratitude.
meanings.sent4: The ungenerosities of winter left the trees bare and cold.
meanings.sent5: The ungenerosities of the landlord made living there unbearable.

meanings.definition: Acts or instances of being ungenerous.
meanings.sent1: His ungenerosities were evident in his refusal to help.
meanings.sent2: The ungenerosities of the boss affected morale in the office.
meanings.sent3: The ungenerosities of the cat stealing food were comical.
meanings.sent4: Her ungenerosities were like dark clouds overshadowing the group.
meanings.sent5: The ungenerosities of the storm left destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ungenerous.
meanings.sent1: The ungenerosities of his character were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent2: She was known for the ungenerosities in her actions.
meanings.sent3: The ungenerosities of the situation were like a puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: The ungenerosities of the mountain blocked the path to success.
meanings.sent5: His ungenerosities were like a heavy weight on his conscience.
